_instructions: Add your work experience here. Copy the experience object for each job.

experiences.title: Data Analyst
experiences.description:
• Spearheaded fraud detection initiative analyzing 100K+ monthly transactions, implementing ML algorithms (logistic regression, ensemble methods) that reduced false positives by 20% and saved $2M annually in fraudulent claims
• Automated critical data pipelines using SQL, Python, and AWS Lambda, reducing data processing time from 4 hours to 30 minutes (87.5% improvement) and enabling real-time decision-making for operations team
• Architected 5+ executive Tableau dashboards tracking KPIs for 10+ stakeholders, improving operational transparency by 40%
• Led premium optimization project through A/B testing on pricing models, generating $500K revenue increase within 3 months while improving customer satisfaction scores by 15%
• Established data quality framework conducting root cause analysis that resolved 95% of data inconsistencies, ensuring 99.9% data accuracy across 1M+ customer records

experiences.title: Data Analyst Intern
experiences.description:
• Analyzed 1M+ policyholder records using advanced SQL (window functions, CTEs) and Python (Pandas, NumPy), identifying high-value customer segments that drove 25% premium revenue growth ($300K+) in Q4 2024
• Developed interactive Tableau dashboards visualizing claims frequency and policy metrics, reducing report delivery time by 50% and enabling self-service analytics for 15+ business users
• Engineered automated ETL pipeline using Airflow and dbt, eliminating 70% of manual data preparation tasks and saving 20 hours weekly in operational overhead
• Optimized customer retention through A/B testing on personalized email campaigns, achieving 12% increase in renewal rates and generating $300K additional revenue

experiences.title: Data Analyst
experiences.description:
• Optimized big data operations by refining SQL queries for 3M+ records in Snowflake using clustering keys and indexing, achieving 50% reduction in dashboard load times
• Built predictive churn models using logistic regression and decision trees with 85% accuracy, increasing customer retention by 25% and saving $200K annually in acquisition costs
• Created 10+ Power BI dashboards integrating AWS Redshift and Snowflake data, improving real-time business monitoring and reporting accuracy by 40%
• Automated ETL pipelines with Apache NiFi and AWS Glue, reducing processing time from 4 hours to 30 minutes (80% improve- ment)
• Drove $500K revenue growth (15% increase) through customer behavior analysis, identifying cross-sell and upsell opportunities across 500K+ customer base
